titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require the national committees of political parties to file pre-general election reports with the Federal Election Commission without regard to whether or not the parties have made contributions or expenditures under such Act during the periods covered by such reports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 10/09/1998--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require national committees of political parties to file certain pre-general election reports with the Federal Election Commission.
